array.name: workshop_desc
array.item: This lecture aims at providing enough knowledge to build a Mechanically feasible design of a bot
You will be taught the basics of making an Android App using the official Android Studio IDE.
This lecture aims at teaching the basics of Aeromodelling and Aerodynamics.
This Lecture aims at teaching how to make a website and make it interactive and also to connect with the database and the servers

Matlab is used as a calculator that can simplify our work a lot. It has multidisciplinary applications as in Mathematics, Software, Electronic and Electrical Engineering and many more. It is an authentic software
This lecture aims at teaching the basics of computer programming and fundamentals of programming of Arduino and Raspberry Pi
This lecture will introduce you to ICs which are the basic elements of almost every technical device, following programmable ones which you can code to work out in any way you want.
Sensors To Robots are like Senses To Human.This lecture is helpful for understanding the working of basic sensors and their applications.
This session is aimed to teach students the basics of electronics
You will get to know various neat tricks plausible on Windows,and\nHow to keep your computer protected and how to access others social networks or Wifi.

array.name: workshop_future
array.item: After attending this, you will be able to use various type of gears, will know their mechanism of working, and from then you will see the world in a new perspective of mechanics.

Android is fast emerging as the most used OS on mobile phones. Acquiring the skills of creating basic apps for the same in the lecture, you can nurture them further and who knows we may all be using your app soon!
After attending this lecture, you would be able to understand how these flying machines soar high up in the air and understand how to make a model aeroplane on your own

Web development has became a necessity nowadays. After this lecture you will be able to make a website with awesome designs using various languages. Also you will get to know about the databases and the Backend.

Since it useful in almost every field of education and research, Learning Matlab can give us a boost in our technical and research career. Image and video processing is a vital application. It is easy to code many algorithm in Matlab which are difficult to implement in other environments.
After attending this lecture, you would be able to write a program code on your own, control the brains of your robots, and use a mini-computer which can fit into your pockets!
One can make amazing circuits like blinking of Led using 555 Timer IC on their own. You will also be able to work upon the brain of Robots !!!
You can design a cicuit or a robot which can Interact and gather information from the Environment, hence make autonomous robots !!

Electronics are widely used nowadays from a torch to the Smartphones. You will be able to identify and use the basic electronic components. The Electronics is going to be very vital in your life in the future.

You can go on to become a white or grey hat hacker and serve as an integral part of any company which stores/manipulates data online. Or you could use the acquired skills just to make sure you dont fall prey to the vicious dark corners of the internet.

Mechanical tools,

Steering Mechanisms,
Types of wheels,
Power Transmission,
Designing Softwares

Introduction,
Basic Aerodynamics Terms, 
Parts of Aeroplanes,
DIY,
Types of Helicopter and its Mechanism,
Quadcopters and its Stabilization

Introduction to Matlab software
Uses,
Application in various fields,
Image processing,
Simulation (simulink).

Introduction to programming languages,
Basics of C programming-variables,
Constants,
Keywords,
Datatypes,
Operators,
Desicion making statements,
Loops,
Functions,
Arrays,
Introduction to Arduino and its programming,
Making of line follower robot,
Introduction to Raspbery Pi.

Intro - Moores Law,
Need for IC,
Advantages/Disadvantages,
Types of ICs;
IC Package,

Logic Gates, 
Data Sheet,
Common ICs; 

MCU -

Features, 
Arduino,
Raspberry Pi

Introduction to Sensors,

Types of Sensors,
Application

Intro to electronic components,
Wires and connectors,
Circuit boards,
Transistors,
Diodes,
H-bridge,
Batteries.

array.name: practical_desc
array.item: Lets use this awesome 555 Timer IC for some synchronized LED blinking. Make the LED dance on your commands.
Using OP-AMP for the blinking of several LED at a time.

Make a Robot which will act according to your instructions and have a competetion with the bots of your fellow members. So you will get the real feeling of robotics here at the very first time in your life..
Lets use the most used Microcontroller for the Robotics and make a Ultrasonic sensor work according to your instructions.
